subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Lance Stephenson, one of Coney Island’s finest and the top career scorer in state high school history, played in his hometown for the first time as a collegian and received a rude reception in Cincinnati’s loss to St. John’s.
snippet: Lance Stephenson, one of Coney Island’s finest and the top career scorer in state high school history, played in his hometown for the first time as a collegian and received a rude reception in Cincinnati’s loss to St. John’s.
